body: The ranger's skin becomes rough and scaly. While in this form, the ranger gains a +4 natural armor bonus to AC and a fly speed of 30 feet with average maneuverability. Alternately, the ranger can polymorph into the form of a dragon as if the caster of form of the dragon I.
url: pfsrd://Advanced Players Guide/Rules/Core Classes/Ranger/Ranger Archetypes/Shapeshifter/Master Shifter/Form of the Dragon
name: Form of the Dragon
